description: The bear is shot dead after a Dutch national is attacked in a campsite near Longyearbyen.
title: Polar bear kills man in Norway's Arctic Svalbard islands
title_page: Polar bear kills man in Norway's Arctic Svalbard islands - BBC News
maintext: Two days later the team from the Norwegian Polar Institute that moved the two bears spotted the three-year-old and ushered it away from Longyearbyen with their helicopter. Jon Aars, who took part in the operation, told the BBC the bear had earlier broken into cabins not far from the city.
